Description.Text: Meresuu Spa & Hotel is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation on the Baltic coast. Highlights include a luxury spa, indoor swimming pool, an international restaurant and excellent location close to the beach. Narva-Joesuu is a relaxing beach resort next to the Russian border on the northeast coast of Estonia, approximately 15km from the city of Narva. Nearby places of interest include the pretty town centre of Narva-Joesuu, a number of beautiful parks, lush pine forests and the white sand beach. The hotel occupies a modern complex featuring a high-rise tower with a white facade. Facilities include a modern gym and spa comprising both indoor and outdoor swimming pools, whirlpools, saunas, steam rooms, sun-beds and private treatment rooms. Standard rooms showcase a modern decor with light tones and dark wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, free wired internet, a work desk, mini-bar and flat-screen satellite TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower and bathrobes. The hotel restaurant is an elegant venue offering Estonian cuisine and international dishes complemented by fine wines, and a breakfast buffet is provided every morning. The stylish piano bar features a billiards table and is ideal for a relaxing cocktail or light snack. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers bike rental.
